features.private: PRIVATE Transactions are completely private, with no public transaction history
features.low_fees: LOW FEES Minimal transaction fees, making it cost-effective even for small payments
features.secure: SECURE: Strong cryptography ensures your funds and data are safe
features.unblockable: UNBLOCKABLE Every coin is equal, with no history of being 'tainted' or blacklisted
features.distributed: DISTRIBUTED No central authority controls the network, offering true financial freedom

steps.step1: STEP 1: Download Cake Wallet or Monero.com wallet
steps.step2: STEP 2: Create Your wallet and carefully record the seed phrase provided. Store it securely in a private, safe place!
steps.step3: STEP 3: Open the wallet, navigate to the 'Exchange' section, and enter the amount of money you wish to convert into Monero (XMR). Choose your preferred payment method (such as Credit Card, Bank Transfer, SEPA, etc.) follow the steps

advantages.privacy: Privacy: Every payment is private by default. You pay with Monero like you pay with cash!
advantages.low_fees: Low fees: Minimal transaction fees, even for substantial amounts!
advantages.no_chargebacks: No Chargebacks: Once a Monero transaction is confirmed on the blockchain, it cannot be reversed.

page2.call_to_action1: Take control of your financial future today with Monero!
page2.call_to_action2: You can't be blocked with Monero, you can send money everywhere in the World almost for free and nobody can see it!
page2.call_to_action3: The time to act is now!

website.page_description: Monero is a secure, private, and untraceable cryptocurrency.
website.page_keywords: Monero, cryptocurrency, digital cash, secure transactions, financial freedom, private, low fees, untraceable, fungible, decentralized
website.title:
Use
Monero
website.subtitle:
Get
Financial
Freedom
website.advantage-privacy: Privacy: every payment is private by default. You pay with Monero like you pay with cash!
website.advantage-low-fees: Low Fees: minimal transaction fees, even for substantial amounts!
website.advantage-no-chargebacks: No Chargebacks: once a Monero transaction is confirmed on the blockchain, it cannot be reversed.
website.fiat-into-monero-step1:
Step 1:

Download Cake Wallet or Monero.com wallet.
website.fiat-into-monero-step2:
Step 2:

Create Your wallet and carefully record the seed phrase provided. Store it securely in a private, safe place!
website.fiat-into-monero-step3:
Step 3:

Open the wallet, navigate to the “Exchange” section, and enter the amount of money you wish to convert into Monero (XMR).

Choose your preferred payment method (such as Credit Card, Bank Transfer, SEPA, etc.) follow the steps.
website.know-your-customer: Know Your Customer, refers to the identification of customers by companies to monitor them
website.dont-know-your-customer: Don't Know Your Customer, refers to the absence of customer identification by companies
website.know-your-customer-light: Know Your Customer light, refers to the absence of additional customer identification by companies
website.fiat: Fiat Currency, such as Euro, US Dollar, Swiss Franc, etc.
website.cex: Centralized Exchange, an exchange operated by a company where customers must verify their identity
website.dex: Decentralized Exchange, an exchange operated by a network of users where customers do not need to verify their identity
website.copyright:
Monero Community Project
